name: Extinction (itch) (defective_toast)
description:
Just another day at the office. Except human extinction is on the horizon? 

Make your way to the top floor to get to your boss' office. 


Arrow keys or WASD to move
'E' to interact
'R' to drop grenade
'Space' to attack

Tested on Chrome on Mac

Made for the VimJam2 Game Jam 
1 person team
